00019 #ifndef OUTLIER_DETECTOR_HPP_cm130522_
00020 #define OUTLIER_DETECTOR_HPP_cm130522_
00021 
00022 #include <vector>
00023 
00024 #include "polynomial_regression.hpp"
00025 
00026 class outlier_detector {
00027 public:
00028   typedef boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<double> matrix_type;
00029   typedef boost::numeric::ublas::vector<double> vector_type;
00030   
00031   outlier_detector(size_t n, // max. degree of polynomial
00032                    const std::vector<std::pair<double, double> >& xy) // (x,y) pair
00033     : n_(n)
00034     , x_(n)
00035     , q_(n,n)
00036     , chi2_(0)
00037     , dof_(0) {
00038   }
00039 
00040   double eval(double t) const {
00041     const vector_type a(make_a(t));
00042     return inner_prod(a,x_);    
00043   }
00044   double eval_err(double t) const {
00045     const vector_type a(make_a(t));
00046     return inner_prod(a, vector_type(prod(q_,a)));    
00047   }
00048 
00049   size_t n() const { return n_; }
00050   double x(size_t index) const { return x_(index); }
00051   double q(size_t i, size_t j) const { return q_(i,j); }
00052   double chi2() const { return chi2_; }
00053   size_t dof() const { return dof_; }
00054 
00055 protected:
00056   vector_type make_a(double t) const {
00057     vector_type a(n());
00058     double t_acc(1);
00059     for (size_t i(0); i<n(); ++i) {
00060       a(i) = t_acc;
00061       t_acc *= t;
00062     }
00063     return a;
00064   }
00065 
00066 private:
00067   size_t      n_;  // order of polynomial
00068   vector_type x_;  // parameters to be estimated
00069   matrix_type q_;  // variance-covariance matrix for x
00070   double      chi2_;
00071   size_t      dof_;
00072 } ;
00073 
00074 #endif // OUTLIER_DETECTOR_HPP_cm130522_
